title: UNLIMITED TECH BUDGET: what would you buy??
description: New Customers Exclusive  Get $25 off your purchase of any AMD and Intel Processor (limit one per customer):  Check out Micro Centers Custom PC Builder:  Shop LG 27GP950-B.AUS 27":  Shop Intel Core i9-12900KS:  Shop MSI Z690 MEG Godlike:  Shop MSI GPUs:  Shop Crucial 64GB (2 x 32GB) DDR5-4800:  Shop Corsair 7000D:  Shop Crucial P5 Plus SSD:  Shop ASUS Republic of Gamers Thor 1200 Watt:  Shop Corsair H170i ELITE LCD:   Subscribe to Ken's channel @Denki!  More shenanigans on @thisis:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
